title: Why should I even play this game anymore...?
body: It's so demotivating to get stomped. I was Renekton top. Olaf just kinda E'd me into hell anytime I existed. Even when I was farming under tower he just chipped me away with that stupid true damage. Losing is just an antifun waste of time most games, honestly.

replies.body: please tell me you didnt just let him keep using e on you, like you should be getting ewqe back out at least

At some point everyone needs to take a break from their favorite game. Maybe this is the point for you?

People get burned out, frustrated, bored, etc. No biggie, play something else for a few weeks or months. Come back later and see what's changed.

Its true in every game that has ever been.
